title: ‘Atlanta’ Episode 8, ‘Ultimate Girls’ Episode 4, and ‘Beverly Hills’ Episode 8
description:
Rachel kicks off this week’s 'Morally Corrupt' by breaking down the L.A. Times' Randall Emmett exposé with Chelsea Stark-Jones (1:20), before Rachel and Chelsea move on to discuss Season 14, Episode 8 of ‘The Real Housewives of Atlanta’ (12:00). Rachel is then joined by Jodi Walker to chat about Season 2, Episode 4 of ‘The Real Housewives Ultimate Girls Trip’ (28:00), as well as Season 12, Episode 8 of ‘The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills’ (52:08).
Host: Rachel Lindsay
Guests: Chelsea Stark-Jones and Jodi Walker
Producers: Devon Manze and Chelsea Stark-Jones
Theme Song: Devon Renaldo
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
